drinks.title: Bellini
drinks.instructions: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

drinks.title: Black russian
drinks.instructions:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned-glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

drinks.title: Bloody mary
drinks.instructions: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish with celery and lemon wedge (optional).

drinks.title: Caipirinha
drinks.instructions: Place lime and sugar in an old fashioned glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaça. (For a Caipiroska - use Vodka instead of Cachaça).

drinks.title: Champagne cocktail
drinks.instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.title: Cosmopolitan
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice.Strain into a large cocktail glass .Garnish with lime slice.

drinks.title: Cuba libre
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.title: French 75
drinks.instructions: Pour all the ingredients, except champagne, into a shaker. Shake.Strain into a champagne flute.Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

drinks.title: French connection
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
Stir gently.

drinks.title: God father
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.title: God mother
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.title: Golden dream
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Grasshopper
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
Shake briskly for few seconds.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Harvey wallbanger
drinks.instructions:
Pour vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently and float Galliano on top. Garnish with orange slices and cherry.

drinks.title: Hemingway special
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.
Strain into a double cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Horse's neck
drinks.instructions:
Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into hi-ball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently.
Garnish with rind of one lemon spiral.
If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

drinks.title: Irish coffee
drinks.instructions: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

drinks.title: Kir
drinks.instructions:
Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.
For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

drinks.title: Long island iced tea
drinks.instructions:
Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice.
Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw.

drinks.title: Mai-tai
drinks.instructions:
Shake and strain into highball glass.
Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime peel.
Serve with straw.

drinks.title: Margarita
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt
(note:Fruit Margarita – blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

drinks.title: Mimosa
drinks.instructions:
Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently.
Garnish with orange twist (optional).
Note: a Buck’s Fizz and a Mimosa are the same drink.

drinks.title: Mint julep
drinks.instructions:
In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water.
Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.
Garnish with a mint spring.

drinks.title: Mojito
drinks.instructions:
Muddle mint springs with sugar and lime juice.
Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water.
Garnish with spring of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.

drinks.title: Moscow mule
ingredients: 1 slice lime in a highball glass
drinks.instructions:
Combine the vodka and ginger beer.
Add lime juice.
Garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.title: Pina colada
drinks.instructions:
Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.
Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

drinks.title: Rose
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Sea breeze
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.title: Sex on the beach
drinks.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.title: Singapore sling
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well.
Strain into highball glass.
Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cher

drinks.title: Tequila sunrise
drinks.instructions:
Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball with ice cubes.
Add a splash of grenadine to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

drinks.title: Alexander
drinks.instructions:
Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

drinks.title: Americano
drinks.instructions: Mix the ingredients directly in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice-cubes, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.title: Angel face
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Aviation
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Bacardi
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Between the sheets
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Casino
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist and a marachino cherry.

drinks.title: Clover club
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.
Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Daiquiri
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Derby
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh mint leaves in the drink.

drinks.title: Dry martini
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
Stir well. Strain in chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

drinks.title: Gin fizz
drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon slice.

drinks.title: John collins
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.
Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
(Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

drinks.title: Manhattan
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.Garnish with cocktail cherry.

drinks.title: Mary pickford
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Monkey gland
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Negroni
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.Garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.title: Old fashioned
drinks.instructions:
Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water.
Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange slice and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.title: Paradise
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Planter's punch
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinks.title: Porto flip
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well.
Strain into cocktail glass.
Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

drinks.title: Ramos gin fizz
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

drinks.title: Rusty nail
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

drinks.title: Sazerac
drinks.instructions:
Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.
Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the Lemon peel for garnish. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

drinks.title: Screwdriver
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.title: Sidecar
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Stinger
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir.
Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Tuxedo
drinks.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry and a lemon zest twist.

drinks.title: Whiskey sour
drinks.instructions:
Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white).
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain in cocktail glass.
If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with half orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.title: White lady
drinks.instructions:
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

drinks.title: B52
drinks.instructions:
Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier.
Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

drinks.title: Bramble
drinks.instructions:
Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass.
Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.
Garnish with a lemon slice, and two blackberries.

drinks.title: Dark 'n' stormy
drinks.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl Dark Rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.title: Dirty martini
drinks.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
Stir well.
Strain in chilled martini glass.
Garnish with green olive.

drinks.title: Espresso martini
ingredients: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: French martini
drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

drinks.title: Kamikaze
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Lemon drop martini
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar, garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.title: Pisco sour
drinks.instructions:
Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute.
Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

drinks.title: Russian spring punch
drinks.instructions:
Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a blackberry.

drinks.title: Spritz veneziano
drinks.instructions:
Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.
Top with a splash of soda water.
Garnish with half orange slice.

drinks.title: Tommy's margarita
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.title: Yellow bird
drinks.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
